long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Chess Rabbit brings the classic game of chess to your browser, allowing you to play against intelligent bots powered by the renowned Lozza engine. Whether you're a beginner or a seasoned player, Chess Rabbit offers a challenging and enjoyable experience for everyone.

Features:

Play Against Bots: Challenge yourself against bots of varying difficulty levels.
Lozza Engine: Enjoy advanced gameplay powered by the sophisticated Lozza engine.
User-Friendly Interface: Clean and intuitive design makes it easy to start a game and navigate the board.
Customisable Boards: Personalize your chess experience


With enough community interest, we plan to add more exciting features.  Please send feedback to chessrabbit24@gmail.com
